entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
